alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 28 at 6:26AM CDT until November 02 at 7:32AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Kaufman and Ellis Counties. Trinity River At Trinidad affecting Navarro and Henderson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Trinidad. * WHEN...From late tonight to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, Minor flooding to woodlands and low land areas will occur on the right bank of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 29.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 33.0 feet. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 38.4 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
